DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate ginger efficacy adjuvant ketoprofen treatment headache symptom related migraine attack .
DOC.brief_title: Ginger Capsules Acute Treatment Migraine Attacks
DOC.detailed_description: Patients diagnosis migraine accord IHS criterion enrol study migraine attack . Patients receive two 200 mg capsule dry ginger extract ( 5 % active ingredient ) two capsule placebo ( cellulose ) addition intravenous dose ketoprofen ( 100 mg ) treat migraine attack .
DOC.criteria: Migraine diagnosis least one year ; One six migraine attack per month . Patients headache characterized migraine ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Fertile sexually active woman use contraception ; Abuse painkiller , alcohol drug ; People hypersensitivity ginger ; People neurological disease ; People use anticoagulant drug ; People start disease 50 year old .
